"but it's not ok for her to also have one of the easiest ways in the game to avoid danger as well."

Not that I'm complaining, I don't have a problem with her 100-0, but much like Zed, she has an easy get out of jail card if she messes up. 

Even if its a matter of balance, she still has issues, her E hit box has been way too wide for far too long, and been something complained about for quite a long time even from before she lost her silence, if they at least fix that or make the graphics more clearer to read, it would be a start.
